pytket-honeywell
================

| ```pytket`` <https://cqcl.github.io/pytket>`__ is a Python module for
  interfacing
| with CQC t\|ket>, a set of quantum programming tools.

| ``pytket_honeywell`` is an extension to ``pytket`` that allows
  ``pytket`` circuits to
| be executed on Honeywell's quantum devices.

Getting started
---------------

| ``pytket_honeywell`` is available for Python 3.6, 3.7 and 3.8, on
  Linux and MacOS.
| To install, run:

``pip install pytket_honeywell``
